website_summaries.verdict: The general feedback about the Skechers GOtrain - Endurance was that it was very comfortable to wear. Many recommended using it for workouts and claimed that it was durable. On the flip side some people reported that the cushioning was insufficient, and that the toe box was too roomy. But in the whole, the shoe was deemed as a solid choice for everyway training.
pros: The Skechers GOtrain - Endurance received tons of praise for its comfortability
Its style and design were admired by many
Gym aficionados highly recommended using it for workouts because it was supportive
A good number of users liked that it felt light on the foot
Several reviewers stated that it was durable
There were a few purchasers who claimed that it kept the foot steady
The arch support was deemed sufficient by a handful of wearers
This pair of Skechers workout shoes was considered affordable by a few buyers
It provided adequate cushioning, according to some commenters
The traction was sufficient for a minority of testers
cons: A few people complained that the GOtrain - Endurance lacked cushioning
A minority of consumers washed for more color options
Some felt that the toe box was too spacious

customer_reviews.title: High quality, well fitting.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and well fitting trainers. I'm using them for everyday use rather than sports so can't comment on their suitability for running etc. The grips on the soles are better than your average trainer, whilst the rest of the trainer is of high quality and seem durable. Overall, I'm happy with these, particularly as it was a flash deal!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mcintyre

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: the trainers are fine but I had to go up a size as first pair my normal size where to small I think American sizing when converted to English is not accurate other than that I love Sketchers and have worn them for a good few years now and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: davemac

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight aluminium
customer_reviews.text: These are great trainers, you feel like your walking on air they are so light on the feet. This is my second pair. I recommend them 100%
customer_reviews.author: simon jones

customer_reviews.title: Not what I’ve had before with Skechers !!
customer_reviews.text: These trainers should feel really comfortable but they don’t I’ve had many pairs of Skechers and they’ve all been so comfortable what happened to this pair I don’t know. If I could have scored them zero I would have I’m very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Reed

customer_reviews.title: They re good. But I have 4 different types of sketchers ...
customer_reviews.text: They re good. But I have 4 different types of sketchers trainers and these are the least comfortable. Still comfortable but theres better ones for same or less price
customer_reviews.author: padrock

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and well made
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with these. I bought them for indoor cardio gym work and they grip like glue. They were also used on a long 5 mile hike up & down a steep trail and they never faultered once. Excellent shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Mags :)

customer_reviews.title: good shoe
customer_reviews.text: great quality, looking forward to using them , very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: jimky11

customer_reviews.title: but comfortable as ever
customer_reviews.text: A little more rigid than I have come to expect, but comfortable as ever.
customer_reviews.author: Roddenberry

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable for long run and workout :)
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of trainers!! Just like any other pair of Skechers, it's very comfortable and great for gym!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit for wider feet
customer_reviews.text: Durable and comfy with a good amount of grip. Can't fault for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Alexander ter Kuile

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit and comfortable, I am happy with this product. Little broad in the front than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Deepak Bajaj

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go Train-Endurance Multisport Outdoor Shoes
product_meta.description: True performance training comes in the skechers got rain - endurance shoe. A true multi activity athletic training shoe with advanced comfort, stability and support that your workout demands. Lightweight and breathable mesh and 3D print synthetic upper.
feature_bullets: Wide footprint for maximum surface traction and stability
